wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Elisabeth Innes-Ker, Duchess of Roxburghe (née McConnel; 23 December 1918 – 2 June 1983), later Hambro, was a Scottish activist and noblewoman.

response: He married two more times: first to Margaret Innes-Ker, Duchess of Roxburghe in 1976, secondly to Margaret, Countess Fortescue (née Elisabeth Margaret Stratton, formerly married to Richard Fortescue, 7th Earl Fortescue) in 1988.
*Margaret Innes-Ker, Duchess of Roxburghe (née McConnel; 1918–1983) (2nd wife of the 9th Duke)
